name: The Idle Clicker Game
description:
🔥 Cashout anytime - Low wait processing
💸 Very Low minimum Cashout. Give us a try!
📥 Get Paid Real Money!
🍀 Sent directly to your PayPal.

---------------------- All Free ----------------------------

Got some empty time? Not doing much?
Get a load of this app!!

Watch some ads to gain spins!
Spins then turn into coins!
Coins then turn into Cash!

This is not a get rich quick type gimmick.
Cashout each time you hit the minimum threshold (Which is very small)
The more your play the more you can earn!

Just as the title says, you can just Click and move on!, It takes no time at all
and you could earn yourself some change while your waiting.

Tested on numerous devices, Battery consumption is very low.

Very simple interface, Easy to understand.

What are you waiting for? Wouldn't you like some spare change today?! or tomorrow? or the next day?!

Confused? Comment or Feedback to give?
You can leave it below or check the App for a link to our discord server or direct email!

Happy Spinnin!
